Description:
Charming Modesty
The ever enduring lure of a white picket fence and iron-laced verandah remain to entice at this handy address. Stained glass windows and an open fireplace continue their charming presence, where 11' timber ceilings soar above Baltic pine floors. Gas heating and ducted cooling, plus a 900mm stainless steel cooker bring comfort and a little luxury indoors. The bathroom services 3 good-sized bedrooms and there's a multi-purpose room that could be a study or cosy second living area.
Simple yet sufficient to lend a rosy outlook, the sunny side garden has flexible prospects, whether screened to create a private retreat or utilised for extra off-street parking. Add a few pot plants and a splash of paving paint to the rear verandah, where a blank canvas inspires your preferred style of outdoor living.
A primary school sits just around the corner and it's only a 4 minute cycle to secondary college.
A nearby creek-side track also delivers a safe route into the CBD via Lake Weeroona in one direction, and Botanic Gardens park and pool in the other.
A short walk to shops and the bus stop into Bendigo adds even more convenience to this location.
Recent tenants who were paying $230 per week, have moved out allowing vacant possession.
Aluminium cladding, powder-coated front fence, new Colorbond fencing and on a compact allotment means minimal maintenance is required, ideal for busy people or investors.
Modest yet highly appealing, this property continues to possesses endearing allure.
Paul Byrne : 0439 441 198

Description:
IDEAL FOR FIRST HOME BUYERS, RETIREES & INVESTORS
This brick veneer home is situated within a stones throw of White Hills Botanical Gardens, shops and schools and only a short drive to the Bendigo CBD. There are two bedrooms with built in robes, living room with air conditioning and gas heating which adjoins the open plan kitchen with gas hotplates and electric wall oven. The bathroom includes a shower, bath and vanity plus a separate laundry. The compact rear yard is easy to maintain and also includes a single lock-up garage with automatic roller door. Be quick to inspect this lovely property as it will appeal to first home buyers, investors or those looking to downsize.
Andrew Pearce : 0419 544
251

Description:
Quiet, Comfortable & Complete!
Whether it's your first home, you're a retiree looking for low maintenance living, or simply a small family wanting a little extra, this property will tick a lot of boxes. Features include 3 bedrooms, main with walk in robe and ensuite, built in robes to other bedrooms, open plan meals/living with modern kitchen including stone bench tops, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances, ducted cooling throughout and gas heating. From the meals you step out onto the magnificent covered outdoor entertaining area which overlooks the private rear yard. Outside includes a garage with internal access to the home, a further colorbond shed/garage and handy double gates into the rear yard ideal for storing the caravan, boat or trailer. Situated in popular White Hills in a quiet well kept court only minutes from the White Hills Botanical Gardens, schools, shopping and transport. Enjoy the leisure lifestyle opportunities and easy living convenience this property has to offer.
Insights: 4 Lorna Court, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Home with Spacious Yard and Tradie's Shed
Ideally located within walking distance to Lake Weeroona, bus stops and local shops, this home awaits your inspection.
From the moment you walk through the door, you'll be impressed by the presentation of this delightful property.
Three good sized bedrooms, recently updated bathroom and neat kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of room for a large table.
2 living areas are a rarity in these homes, making a standout above any other on the market.
Ducted heating and cooling plus 2 split systems and a solid fuel heater make the home comfortable in all seasons.
Measuring just under a 1/4 acre, this home is ideal for those with extra vehicles, trailers, boat or caravan, and there is still plenty of room for kids and pets.
Completing this great package, is a large tradesman's shed with concrete floor and power, plus an immaculate front yard with large decked area. This lovely, affordable home awaits!
Matt Gretgrix : 0438 911 688

Description:
Perfect Investments Both Units Leased at $295 Per Week
Walking distance to White Hills shops and within a short stroll to Lake Weeroona the Bendigo Hospital, and so much more, this charming Brand New two-bedroom unit will suit your budget, style and location requirements. Its classic open plan design guarantees ease of living and adjoins a modern kitchen ideal for the keen chef. Two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, split system reverse cycle heating and cooling, ample storage throughout, privately located at the rear of a small complex. Perfect for a retiree downsizing, a first home buyer, or investors will also find value here with the units leased out with greater tax incentives as the property is brand new. Great value, ideal location. Why wait to build your own investment?

Description:
Urban oasis is a work of art
The inscription on the entrance to this property says it all - "en plein air" is French for outdoor painting and this artist's abode is like walking through a beautiful canvas.
Set on approximately 10,000 square metres (2.5 acres) of tranquil garden spaces, the architect-inspired, solid-brick residence is filled with character, warmth and personal style. Thanks to continuing improvement and a creative eye, the current owners have given it a new lease on life.
Glass, limed timber and light feature throughout the multi-level home where the elegant and inviting inviting main bedroom, (with all-new ensuite) and convenient study/nursery on the upper level both enjoy fabulous views over the rambling rear garden and picturesque dam at the end of the property.
Northern light-fills the reading/sitting room adjoining the kitchen/meals area while the kitchen makeover includes German-built Neff double oven, ceramic electric hob, dishwasher, new bench tops, splash backs and unique butler's pantry incorporating preparation area, ample storage and adjoining laundry and gardener's toilet.
Lower-level houses a separate wing for kids or guests with two more bedrooms and big bathroom with corner spa.
Spacious formal lounge boasts a wet bar, open fireplace with efficient Jetmaster insert and seamless access to two alfresco areas.
Enjoy year-round entertaining in the atrium courtyard complete with solid fuel heater and gas barbecue or under the vine-draped iron arbour where you can sit and dine in style among the lavender and rose beds with a winding tree-lined driveway rolling past.
Over the past few years the owners have added over 50 ornamental pear trees, crab apples and weeping cherries to enhance the stands of established gum trees and sprawling grassed areas.
Added extras are fresh paintwork, 8 solar panels, remote external blinds and storage options slipped into every available space while outdoor essentials include double carport at the front, double garage/workshop, garden shed, vegetable patches and hen house.
Ideally perched on the edge of bushland but with the CBD only 4.5 kilometres away - you need look no further for the perfect tranquil lifestyle. All the hard work is done, just relax reap the benefits over the coming years.
Insights: 20 Church Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
EXQUISITE FAMILY - SIZED ENTERTAINER IN A PREMIER POSITION
Set in the idyllic “Peppercorn Estate” - surrounded by families, safe walking tracks & gardens within a peaceful walk to Lake Weeroona, Bendigo Botanic Gardens & the town centre. This beautifully-designed, exquisite family home boasts a comfortable 620 sq.m allotment with secure off-street access.
- Multiple living zones offer space, versatility,
comfort
and privacy. The kids will especially love the theatre room.
- Luxurious master bedroom with ensuite including dual basins, double shower & spacious walk-in robe.
- Stunning alfresco entertaining area with polished concrete floor, weatherproof cafe blinds and fabulous fireplace seamlessly blending year-round indoor & outdoor living. Access to the rear yard, for additional lawn/play area for the kids.
- Custom-designed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, abundance of storage & breakfast bar.
- Three additional large, light filled bedrooms with inbuilt robes.
- Spacious family bathroom plus internal laundry & loads of storage.
- Ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling & vacuuming system; modern fixtures, neutral colours & desirable high ceilings.
- Large double garage with rear access, workbench & storage.
- Brilliant location - close to walking tracks, schools, Lake Weerona, the Hospital precinct and so much more.
Properties of this calibre in this location are rare & do not last for long. Inspection recommended.
Craig Tweed : 0418 509 081

Description:
SOLID, MODERN AND IN A GREAT POSITION!
Located handy to Lake Weeroona, walking tracks, schools, shops, transport creche and bowling club, 1 Grace Street is an opportunity to live in a great location and enjoy capital growth in such a central Bendigo position - without the central Bendigo price tag.
The home is just superb, fully refurbished and updated throughout, some of the extras are a new ducted gas heating system, new evaporative cooling and ducted vacuum system. The kitchen is modern boasting granite bench tops, stainless electric wall oven and gas hot plates, drawer dishwasher and a pantry. Adjacent is the meals area, and further on is the spacious carpeted lounge with original mantel, TV and data points. There are three good sized bedrooms, the main has a large fitted built in robe and there is a second a smaller fitted robe to bedroom two. The large bathroom is almost new and boasts a fitted basin with storage, semi-framed shower, toilet and a large quality bath; the laundry has also been updated. Good storage throughout, re-painted recently and there are new external sun blinds.
The corner block is approximately 485m2, there is off-street access through a new auto roller door, behind this park space is a single carport and following is a 4m x 8m powered garage â?? all with easy access from Grace Street. The yard is lovely â?? established private shade trees with a mix of deciduous and evergreen shrubs, mulberry and lemon trees and a gazebo. You could access the yard from Bobs Street if you have a large caravan or trailer.
There really is nothing to do but enjoy this established, updated and loved home in a great part of White Hills.
Insights: 1 Grace Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
POSITION PERFECT - NOTHING TO DO!
Located in the best part of White Hills only a short walk to the Botanical Gardens and the main shopping strip is the lovely two-bedroom home on its own title awaiting its new owners.
The two year-old home was custom built by a local private builder and boasts plenty of extras including high ceilings, ornate cornice, and timber benchtops in the kitchen and laundry; ducted gas heating and a large split-system air conditioner.
The home boasts two good sized bedrooms with built in robes; lovely bathroom including a separate bath, shower, vanity unit and heating a large robe/linen press in the hallway.
The living space is large and includes a carpeted lounge area, spacious tiled meals for a larger table, and a fantastic kitchen. The kitchen boasts plenty of bench and cupboard space, electric oven and gas hot plates, dishwasher and double stainless sink; there is a sliding door leading outside to the yard too.
The yard is neat and very easy maintenance including a garden shed, small yard (room for a veggie patch) and access down the side to the single lock-up carport with an auto roller door. There is a space to park a second vehicle too.
One of the best locations in White Hills - it is ideal someone wanting the position and low maintenance home on its very own title, or a great Capital Growth opportunity for an investor (let to great tenants).
Insights: 54A Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful 4 Bedroom Federation-Style Home in a Perfect Location
An opportunity exists to own an architecturally-designed, federation-style home, at the city end of White Hills, just a few minutes from the CBD and even closer to the new Bendigo Hospital.
Impressive from the moment you walk from the front garden through the lovely leadlight doorway, this beautifully-presented home couldn't be better located, having the benefit of being set in a quiet court, with Weeroona College just metres away, along with various walking tracks linking the beautiful Lake Weeroona, glorious Botanical Gardens and the historical O'Keefe Rail Trail.
The 2 separate living areas include a formal lounge with an original fire place, which leads to the refurbished country kitchen and adjoining dining and
family area.
Dressed with parquetry floors, feature lead lights and large windows, this large space has a north-facing aspect, overlooking the garden and alfresco area, which is perfect for summer entertaining.
Boasting 4 bedrooms and a study, the main bedroom is spacious with an ensuite and walk-in robe, while the 4th bedroom is privately positioned upstairs.
Year round comfort is assured with ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans in each room.
Outside, the lock-up back yard has a shed/workshop which has been converted to a studio, allowing a separate space for a variety of interests, or a roller door could be returned for an easy conversion.
With everything an active family could want virtually right at your doorstep, this home is waiting for your prompt inspection.
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

Address: 2 Seventh Hill Court White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
THE HARD WORK IS DONE, ITS TIME TO ENJOY
Located in a quiet court in White Hills, this immaculate family home has nothing left to do for a new owner but move in! The home comprises of 3 bedrooms, the master with a walk-in robe and ensuite, with built in robes to the remaining 2 bedrooms plus there are also 2 living areas allowing plenty of space and comfort. The kitchen is the heart of this home offering a dishwasher, walk in pantry and an island bench overlooking the dining and family rooms with the convenience of ducted heating and cooling throughout ensuring year round comfort. The double carport (7m x 7m approx.) will fit most pop top caravans and the man cave (6m x 8m approx.) is well set up with a solid wood heater, plenty of shelving and a solid work bench with concrete floor and power. For the warmer months there is an above ground pool ready for hours of family fun and entertainment, it is also fully fenced and filtered. Located close to primary and secondary schools, the White Hills Bowls Club, the Botanical Gardens and the Bendigo Jockey Club, this home would be ideal for the family, investor or retirees alike.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME WITH SHEDDING & MAN CAVE!
This fully refurbished home is positioned in a lovely quiet court just off the highway in a very good location being handy to White Hills Gardens, Macca's, shops, schools and all the new things happening on the Epsom side of town. There is lots to mention such as a new kitchen with gas hot plates, electric cooker and dishwasher; new bathroom including separate bath, robes to all three bedrooms, new carpets and it has recently been repainted throughout. The home is very comfy and in excellent order; outside there are plenty of extras too. Single carport with vehicle access to the back yard, separate lock-up powered garage/workshop and a large "man cave" or second living space with wood heater, phone and TV points. There is yard room for kids, space for a smaller caravan, a fish pond, water tank and the yard is quite private. The home has kerb appeal and has a lovely private entry - simple things you just cannot get in a new home without years of hard work to establish the gardens and surrounds.
A lovely home to suit a small family, retirees or someone starting out â?? view to appreciate this much loved family home.

Description:
SPACIOUS MODERN HOME IN A QUIET LOCATION
Set in a quiet location with great access to schools, transport, botanical gardens and shops, this spacious modern brick veneer house will appeal to those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle! Beautifully presented throughout, the home consists of 3 bedrooms, the main with an ensuite and walk in robe with built in robes to the remaining bedrooms, a well equipped kitchen with huge walk in pantry overlooking the open plan meals/living area plus a spacious formal living area. The property also includes a 3 piece bathroom, laundry with good linen storage and the convenience of ducted heating and cooling plus a solar panel system with potential electricity savings. Outside is completely landscaped from top to bottom and offers a decked entertaining area, a handy garden shed and a double garage with auto roller door and direct internal access. All this set on low maintenance allotment with nothing left to do but move in! Be quick to inspect this lovely property.

Description:
Californian Bungalow Charm *New Price*
The home features -
*High ceilings *2 bedrooms
*Leadlight windows *Ceiling roses
*Polished floor boards *Open plan kitchen, dining and living area
*Gas cooking *Gas Log Fire
*Split system heating & cooling *Renovated bathroom/laundry
*Room for further improvement & value adding
Outside the property features -
*Carport *Shed
*Timber deck for outdoor entertaining *Enjoy a coffee on the front veranda
*Fully fenced back yard
Lifestyle -
*Convenient location
*Ride or walk the Bendigo creek trail to Lake Weeroona and Bendigo CBD
*Central to all sporting facilities
*Walk to the Bendigo botanic gardens and enjoy a coffee or BBQ
*Walk to primary and secondary schools
*Close to shops, hotels, chemist, post office, Fish & Chips shop, Fast food and public transport. The list just goes on!

Description:
Esteemed Edwardian Elegance
Superbly spacious on a deep 1060sq. m block, this 3 bedroom plus study double fronted Edwardian captures the heart and soul of family entertaining. Fully renovated featuring high ceilings, beautifully polished floorboards, generous light and bright living room with doors opening on to an outdoor decked entertaining area. Gourmet kitchen with 900ml electric stove, 5 burner gas hot plates, dishwasher and an abundance of cupboards. Separate meals area with built in cupboards. Luxurious bathroom complete with claw foot bath, large shower, pedestal vanity and toilet. The laundry adjoins a 2nd toilet. Extras include ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling, 1.5kw solar system and a 22,000 L. tank. A 6x 8 m shed with remote door has access from Cahill St. Only about a 5 minute drive to the CBD, walking distance to schools and Lake Weeroona. Either enjoy all the space or take up the option of the approved planning permit for a 2 Lot Subdivision. The choice is yours!!

Description:
A SOLID BEGINNING - FIRST HOME BUYER OR INVESTOR
It is a GREAT location being close to shops, schools and transport and a five minute drive to the city centre.
It is a GREAT neighbourhood set amongst a neat, tidy streetscape and close to the Bendigo Creek Walking Track.
It is in GREAT order throughout having been well maintained and looked after for many years.
The home features three bedrooms with a ceiling fan in main and a spacious lounge boasting a reverse cycle split system and large windows letting in lots of light. Adjacent is the meals area which joins the updated kitchen, features include a gas upright cooker, dishwasher, large pantry and plenty of bench space and cabinetry with views to the rear yard.
The family bathroom was updated some years ago and boasts a separate bath, 1.2m corner shower and basin/vanity unit. The laundry is near the back of the home; there is space for a dryer with existing cupboard and robe storage.
Other features include gas wall furnace, gas hot water, polished pine floorboards and timber sash windows.
To the rear of the home is a covered outdoor living space looking over the yard, separate single carport and a single lock up garage with power. There is a lovely grassed area, sealed concrete drive and good fencing.
This is neat and tidy home which would suit a live-in buyer or investor to take advantage of this fantastic Bendigo location.
